meanings.definition: A substance or device used to make something smell fresh or clean.
meanings.sent1: I bought some new fresheners for my car to make it smell nice.
meanings.sent2: The air fresheners in the bathroom always make it smell like flowers.
meanings.sent3: The fresheners in the laundry room were so strong, they made the socks dance!
meanings.sent4: Her perfume was like a fresheners for the soul, bringing a sense of calm.
meanings.sent5: The fresheners in the kitchen were like a breath of fresh air, eliminating any bad odors.

meanings.definition: People or things that refresh or revive something.
meanings.sent1: The team of fresheners worked hard to bring new life to the old garden.
meanings.sent2: After a long day at work, her friends were like fresheners for her spirit.
meanings.sent3: The fresheners at the party were so lively, they made everyone want to dance!
meanings.sent4: His words were like fresheners for her confidence, boosting her self-esteem.
meanings.sent5: The fresheners in the meeting brought new ideas and energy to the discussion.
